name: Sweet Treats Bakery
details: A cozy bakery offering a wide variety of cakes, pastries, and bread. Known for our custom cake designs and friendly atmosphere.

name: Heavenly Cakes
details: Specializes in wedding cakes and custom dessert tables. We use only the finest ingredients for our artisanal cakes.

name: Cake Delights
details: Family-owned bakery with a passion for creating beautiful and delicious cakes for all occasions.

name: The Cake House
details: Offering a unique blend of traditional and contemporary cake designs, perfect for birthdays and celebrations.

name: Dream Cakes
details: Our cakes are not only visually stunning but also incredibly flavorful. Specializing in themed cakes and dessert buffets.

name: Bakers' Delight
details: A favorite among locals for our fresh, handmade cakes and pastries. We also offer baking classes for enthusiasts.

name: Cupcake Heaven
details: Famous for our wide range of cupcakes and mini cakes. Perfect for both casual and formal events.

name: Gourmet Cake Shop
details: Providing luxurious cakes with premium ingredients. Our specialties include mousse cakes and exotic flavors.
